messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Binary Search Tree (BST).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive Binary Search Tree exploration application.
fsm.notes: The FSM captures the states of adding and searching for nodes in a Binary Search Tree.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Bubble Sort.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for the Bubble Sort interactive exploration application.
fsm.notes: The sorting process is visualized with a delay, and the start button is disabled once sorting begins.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Stack.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for an interactive stack exploration web application.
fsm.notes: The application transitions between idle and updating states based on user interactions with the stack.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Heap (Min/Max).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for the Heap (Min/Max) Interactive Exploration application.
fsm.notes: The application transitions between idle, buildingHeap, and heapifying states based on user interactions.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Linked List.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for managing the states and transitions of a linked list exploration application.
fsm.notes: States represent different actions that can be performed on the linked list, with transitions based on user interactions and outcomes.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of Queue.
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite State Machine for an interactive queue exploration application.
fsm.notes: The application allows users to enqueue and dequeue items from a queue, updating the display accordingly.

messages.content:
You are an expert in interactive web design and front-end pedagogy. Please design a high-quality interactive HTML page that provides an in-depth, hands-on exploration of K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN).
Only return HTML code!

fsm.description: Finite state machine for the K-Nearest Neighbors interactive exploration application.
fsm.notes: The 'classifying' state transitions back to 'idle' after classification is done.
